tgt_original: aho aho śākyakulasya ketuḥ |  aho praṇamyaḥ sa narendrasūryo
namo'stu buddhāya viśuddhabodhaye  viśuddhadharmapratibhāsabuddhaye |  saddharmapuṇyopagatānubuddhaye  bhavāgraśūnyāya viśuddhabuddhaye || 1 ||
sattvā hi śūnyā nahi jātu vidyate || 6 ||
nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca jinaṃ smarāmi  nityaṃ ca śocāmi jinasya darśanam |
nityaṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi  saṃbuddhapūjyasya ca darśanārtham || 7 ||
